extracted_playbook.title: Update Simcenter Nastran
extracted_playbook.description: Update Simcenter Nastran to version V2406.5000 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Opening Untrusted BDF Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open untrusted BDF files in the affected applications to reduce risk.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate security mechanisms as a general security measure.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure IT Environment According to Siemens Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Operate devices in a protected IT environment by configuring according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security and product manuals.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, including defense-in-depth strategies.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
